features: focus on natural light and ventilation

rooms.description: A welcoming open space with Vastu-compliant entry door orientation
Spacious living area with large windows for natural light
Connected to the kitchen area; designed for ample ventilation

openings.description: Provides access to the central courtyard which is used as a light and ventilation well
